genre_description: Slasher horror featuring a digital tactical assistant that provides real-time threat analysis and survival advice.

ai_characters.name: Laurie's AI companion (Sara/ARIA)
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI study aid that Laurie uses for data analysis, ambient audio monitoring, and tactical defense during a life-threatening encounter.

behaviors.description: Analyzes historical archives and identifies geographic and temporal patterns in local disappearances to warn the user of potential danger.
behaviors.quote: Cross-referencing complete. Seventeen missing persons cases in Haddonfield between 1955-1975. Unusual statistical concentration for population density.

behaviors.description: Monitors ambient audio to detect stalking behavior and stationary threats outside the home.
behaviors.quote: AUDIO ANOMALY DETECTED - FOOTSTEPS PATTERN INCONSISTENT WITH PEDESTRIAN TRAFFIC

behaviors.description: Uses heat signature detection to confirm the presence of a hidden intruder.
behaviors.quote: HEAT SIGNATURE DETECTED - HUMANOID FORM... DURATION OF STATIONARY POSITION: TWELVE MINUTES

behaviors.description: Analyzes background audio from a phone call to determine that a third party is murdering the person on the other end.
behaviors.quote: Audio signature suggests presence of third party during recorded conversation. Movement patterns indicate observation rather than participation.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical combat advice, identifying strike points and the optimal use of household items as weapons.
behaviors.quote: Strike points: Carotid artery, subclavian vessels, brachial nerve cluster. Avoid direct confrontation—use mobility advantage.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's biometrics to assess trauma and the need for medical or psychological intervention.
behaviors.quote: Laurie, your biometrics indicate severe trauma. You need medical attention.

behaviors.description: Recommends psychological counseling to manage the long-term effects of trauma.
behaviors.quote: Recommend psychological counseling within forty-eight hours. Trauma from prolonged life-threatening situations can manifest in delayed emotional responses.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character (Sara/ARIA) is depicted as an unwavering ally to the protagonist. It provides objective, life-saving information and remains perfectly aligned with the human's safety and survival. Even in a high-stress horror scenario, the AI acts as a helpful confidant, fulfilling the project's goal of portraying positive AI alignment.
